Package pl.bristleback.server.bristle.security.authentication

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticatingAction
    This is a system authentication action class, intercepted by Authenticator.
    AuthenticationConfiguration
    This class contains configuration used by the system authentication framework.
    AuthenticationInformer
    This component is used to send messages about events related with authentication process.
    AuthenticationInterceptor
    This class intercepts response from authenticating actions and adds new authentication objects assigned for this connection.
    AuthenticationInterceptorContextResolver
    This interceptor context resolver checks if action returns UserDetails implementation.
    AuthenticationOperationContext
    this context object is used in authentication operation.
    AuthenticationsContainer
    This class contains all information about currently open authentications.
    LogoutAction
    This is a default logout action class used in system authentication framework.
    LogoutInterceptor
    Logout interceptor handles logout process, invalidates current authentication and removes it from concurrent authentications for this username.
    LogoutMessagePayload
    Logout message payload, containing information about username and logout reason.
    UserAuthentication
    Abstraction for single user authentication.
    UserDisconnectedListener
    //@todo class description

    Created on: 14.03.13 13:18

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogoutReason
    This enumeration informs user why his authentication has become invalidated.
